issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: EDGE: race between global network view broadcast, VM run, and eucanetd network implementation causing VMs to come up without net

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: VPC - EBS backed instances go to terminate, network timing out on NODE

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: NC should delay instance VM booting until network configuration is available

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: MANAGED* Network Modes: NC Gate of instance run on network readiness

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Due to the propogation of the network state independently from instance state, it is possible that an instance can be booted before it's networking is in place. The window is typically very small (<1min) but various delays could widen it. The NC should wait to boot an instance until it can confirm that the networking is in place on that host.
fields.summary: NC should delay VM instance booting until network configuration is available (in all modes)

comments.body: Ticket to ensure this is implemented (differently from 4.1) in the 4.2 codebase.
Assigning to [~nurmi]. Will re-assign if needed.

commit a8162b95aaecf59f63e15ec57e27c2c1911a9193
Author: Daniel Nurmi <nurmi@eucalyptus.com>
Date:   Tue Oct 6 19:11:16 2015 -0700

    latest merge from network-vpc which contains fixes for EUCA-11385 EUCA-11371 EUCA-11358 EUCA-10156

Version     : 4.2.0
Release     : 0.0.23996.695.20151007gitbf619d4.el6

I'm seeing ebs backed VMs fail to reach running state, 'timing out via network gate'. Re-opening this ticket for review. Please let me know if this is better tracked in another ticket? NC logs and basic info about the instance below...
Thanks!
-M

NC logs @ 10.111.5.22
